pr_title: Fix doc style on the deploying to google cloud guide

timeline.bodyText: I don't think you want that? I see no attributes.
timeline.author: gsmet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -105,16 +105,16 @@ You can also let Maven control the deployment of your application using the App
 
 First, add the plugin to your `pom.xml`:
 
-[source, xml]
+[source,xml,subs=attributes+]

replies.bodyText:
Yes, not needed, removed.
I just copied it from another example while trying to understand why the <n> didn't works
replies.author: loicmathieu

timeline.message: Fix doc style on the deploying to google cloud guide
Fix doc style on the deploying to google cloud guide
